language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: The distinction between those two lexical items is not clear
Any noise or sound, but especially of weeping
sound - includes cry of bird etc
Weep, cry, groan, make characteristic sound (Stn)
superscript a between è and ǥ
